original_title: The Case of Abel Cedeno, Bullying, Self Defence , and Growing up Gay
overview: Documentary The volume will need adjusting so you can hear my commentary. Resources: https://www.thetrevorproject.org/  The Trevor Project  https://anti-bullyingalliance.org.uk/ Anti-Bullying Alliance  Abel Cedeno is currently serving a 14-year sentence at Rikers Island
title: The Case of Abel Cedeno, Bullying, Self Defence , and Growing up Gay
